description: The app fails to open a file that exists with a file not found Python trace.
I like it. It does what it says. It would be great to add pasting plain text data functionality. Additionally, it would be best to handle errors better.

Went to https://json-generator.com, grabbed a blob of json and put it in a .json file. Loaded the file in Black Fennec. App crashed and dumped raw output to the GUI without human error message, recovery, or panic. 

This app would be better if it worked, but also if it had a notepad-like interface where json could be pasted in. I seldom have json as files, and the effort required to make a json file before using the app is enough of a barrier to use something else.
summary: Crashed when given a json file

description:
Dear developer. I found your JSON file visualizing app to be most helpful. Good job. There is one more thing you can do and I will give you 5 stars: make it scroll horizontally by rolling the mouse scroll wheel.

Regards
Roy Hoejgaard
Kumander Linux
